head.title: MORGAN COUNTY SCHOOLS - Morgan County Schools

meta.content: Morgan County Schools, WV is a public K-12 institution with approximately 2600 students. We are located in the eastern panhandle of West Virginia.

meta.name: description
meta.content: Morgan County Schools, WV is a public K-12 institution with approximately 2600 students. We are located in the eastern panhandle of West Virginia.

font.font: Our mission is to meet the academic as well as the social/emotional and basic needs of

div.a: Check out the new MoCoEduOnline website!

strong.font:
Governor Justice has announced that the statewide closing for school buildings will be for the remainder of the academic year.
Morgan County Schools will continue distant learning for the remainder of the school year.
